answers.answer: I would see a wound care specialist, this has been going on way too long. Are you sure you do not have diabetes.

question: It has been 2 years since my first hernia surgery my mesh git infected i was treated with anti biotics it didn t work i had to have a second surgery 5 months later the mesh was removed by first surgeon plastic surgeon then rebuilt adomen three weeks later wound opened up you could put  whole hand in was treated with wound vac did not heal 9months later 3rd surgery 9 pounds of skin and whatever removed tebuilt again 3 weeks later opens up sgain doctor says just pack it 4 months later back on wound vac shrunk wound but still open doctor switched to tritac not working help i going nuts long enough doctor seems to not know what to do want healed no sugar no other health problems
title: open wound hp
